title: {{utilitape|Ductape}} {{y|Mod}}
description: Adds an applicator-only modification, {{y|held together by {{utlitlitape|utilitape}}}}, which allows an item to be modified one additional time (excluding {{utlitlitape|utilitape}} itself) but results in a chance whenever the item is used for it to take damage equal to 1/4 of its max hitpoints!
author: {{K-g-G-Y-G-g-K alternation|UnderDoug}}
